channel.title: Merry Christmas!
channel.description:
It's that time of year again, so let's show off the Christmas presents that we have received (or if you are particularly altruistic, you may wish to show off the presents you have given!)
To start things off, I received an Angry Birds helicopter from my girlfriend's mother: [img]http://www.shop.express.co.uk/csp/exp/readeroffers/products/large/HH_GR288.jpg[/img]
And I also bought myself a WWII airfix kit (I aim to convert one of the planes in the kit to be a remote controlled fly, most likely one of the two bombers on the right): [img]http://www.airfix.com/_assets/images/cache/shops/productdetailsmain/A50129-Photo.jpg[/img]

item.title: Merry Christmas!
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:67, topic:537540”]Didn’t ask my parents for anything this year,
actually asked them not to get me anything but of course they bought me some really nice clothes.

However, I bought my mom a golden necklace and some gold earings and she really enjoyed them.
Got them both at JC pennys on sale too, winner[/quote]
He didn’t go to jared :(!

Read full topic

item.title: Merry Christmas!
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Holy shit

Fridder:

I got an Xbox One, Battlefield 4 and Madden 25 for the Xbox One, a GeForce GTX 660, a new Antec 650w PSU, a penny board, $80, and a bunch of clothes.

item.title: Merry Christmas!
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:64, topic:537540”][quote author=Spades link=topic=656362.msg4392746#msg4392746 date=1388119954]
http://i.imgur.com/tHeWgIk.jpg

Yeah… My dog is not afraid of them at all.
[/quote]
Yeah man, my dog grabs it and hides under the closest table or bed. I’d be lucky if I get it back in one piece.
Who’s the little guy in the back? :P[/quote]

That’s my Mom’s dog. He’s getting old and grouchy. He’s still fun to mess with.

Read full topic

item.title: Merry Christmas!
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:58, topic:537540”][quote author=Spades link=topic=656362.msg4392542#msg4392542 date=1388042807]
I feel like a kid, I got a RC Helicopter, and I have been playing with it all day. Best gift ever.
[/quote]
RC Helis are great in my house until the dog gets enough courage to jump and run away with it.

I hope everyone had a fun Christmas. I spent the day at China Town with my family and then went for some frozen yogurt.[/quote]
http://i.imgur.com/tHeWgIk.jpg

Yeah… My dog is not afraid of them at all.

item.title: Merry Christmas!
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:51, topic:537540”][quote author=KroniKz_ link=topic=656362.msg4392482#msg4392482 date=1388015935]

2 bongs, some whiskey, a new monitor, and a chair.
It’s honestly more than I expected and I didn’t think they’d spend that much on me.

edit:
[img width=600]http://i.imgur.com/01O3lcQ.jpg[/i mg]

you’ve managed to get the water that dirty already?
[/quote]
We started smoking out of the clear one as soon as I opened it. A few bowls later we started on with the blue one.[/quote]
sounds like an amazing christmas to me! <3

Read full topic
